April 15, 1957
Mr. Joseph C. Wilson
Director of Public Relations
United Railroad Operating Crafts
Transportation Building
608 South Dearborn
Chicago 5, Illinois
Dear Mr. Wilson:
This is in reply to your letter of April 6,
addressed to Mr. Leo Martin, former president of
the Association for Education by Hadlo-Television.
AERT was merged with the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters at our conventions held
in Atlanta last October. Therefore, if you have
not already done so, you may wish to invite similar
participation by our NAEB president, Dr. Burton
Paulu. You may address him at 1 Eddy Hall, University
of Minnesota, Minneapolis 14, Minnesota.
Sincerely yours
Prank E. Schooley

CC: Burton Paulu
